title: Algeria - Turkey: The first session of the Joint Planning Committee held in Algiers
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and the National Community Abroad, Ramtane LAMAMRA, received today at the headquarters of the Ministry, his counterpart from the Republic of Türkiye, Mr. Mevlüt ÇAVUŞOĞLU, who is paying a working visit to Algeria.

On this occasion, and after a bilateral meeting, the two Ministers co-chaired the meeting of the first session of the Joint Planning Committee with the participation of intersectoral delegations from both sides.
